Subject: Can Heritrix rewrite links for offline reading/parsing?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=224277938
X-Yahoo-Profile: bentlin77

Hello,
looking out for a java application to build corpora of websites I found
Heritrix which seems to be quite state of the art. For my studies I need to
map the extracted pages of a website to a graph- i.e. I need to reconstruct
the links between the pages.

I haven't found a possibility yet to let Heritrix rewrite the links/URIs so
that I can follow the linking by simply relying on the filesystem (like in
an offline reader).

Is there any possibility to do that? Thanks for any help or hints you can
give!

Best regards,

Ruediger
